{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3314298,"name":"","username":"HEFZZJM","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/h/4491bb/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-02-21T10:26:40.507Z","cooked":"

Has anyone ever encountered the same issue? We’ve just got our limelight3 and connected it directly to my computer, and the balena etcher didn’t found our limelight. However, we can discover the limelight with our limelight hardware manager, and we can even enter the web UI of out limelight 3. I’m sure the limelight is not powered with the PDH nor connected to anything else. That’s really weired, and I can’t flash our limelight because of this.

Did you download the usb drivers listed in the downloads page in the LL’s website?

Limelight Vision

Downloads

Limelight Hardware Manager Limelight Hardware Manager 1.3 Bonjour (For stable networking on Windows): Bonjour Download USB Drivers USB Flash Driver Download Flash Tool (Etcher 1.14.3 required for LL3):  For Windows For MacOS 1.14.3 1.14.3  Etcher...

Oh I think I’ve discover the issue. My BalenaEtcher version might be to low, it’s now of version 1.13.3. However version 1.14.3 is required to flash the new limelight3. I may try upadte the tool later
